nodes.text: Gorvan Shrulldike was a man who pursued a career as a pirate.

Gorvan "Blackblood" Shrulldike was the former captain of Evram Darkmere and when Darkmere left the Daupherm Marine Corps, they stole the Discril-class attack cruiser Retribution and set themselves up as pirates and slavers. However, Darkmere began to find slavery repugnant, so he defeated Shrulldike in single combat and took control of the ship.
